front.title: Session Initiation Protocol (SIP) Resource availability Event package

abstract.t: Collecting Resource availability information in Session InitiationProtocol (SIP) devices in real time helps in better managebility ofresources in the SIP network. Resource availability monitoring inSIP devices helps administrator to take informed decision andcorrective measures to tackle under or over resource utilization inthe network. Resource availability information can also be used forSIP overload control in SIP based Media servers by passing resourcedemand vector between devices. This document defines resourceavailability XML document and the mechanisms that can be used toexchange the document between SIP entities.
